title: Milkshake! Bop Box
overview: Presenters Derek Moran, Kemi Majeks, Jen Pringle, Amy Thompson and Olivia Birchenough are whisked into the fantastical world of the Bop Box, where they show viewers how to perform fun dance moves before being magically transformed into the songs' characters, who include astronauts, mermaids, pirates, superheroes and even a couple of wobbly jellies!
